channel.title: New home help
channel.description: when a new character is created where is the coordinates, in witch file that indicate where the character will appear upon creation?

item.title: New home help
item.dc:creator: @sergiypro sergiypro
item.description:
@sergiypro wrote:

… how did u get charecter files…

anyway, thanx but i figured it out… it wasnt in player.java… but it was in the client.java file

if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {
toX = 2399;
toY = 5171;
inPitsGame = false;
PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1;
AtkPray = 0;
StrPrayer = 0;
DefPray = 0;
RangePray = 0;
MagePray = 0;
PrayHeal = false;
ProtItem = false;
ProtMage = false;
ProtRange = false;
ProtMelee = false;
Redemption = false;
Retribution = false;
Smite = false;
Chivalry = false;
Piety = false;
isSkulled = false;
lastSkull = 0;
headIcon = 0;
turnpray();
heightLevel = 0;
currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
deathStage = 0;
resetAnimation();
frame1();
prayOn = false;
AntiTeleDelay = 0;
EntangleDelay = 0;
sM(“You got owned!”);
resetOtherAtk();
followID = 0;
followID2 = 0;
}
if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && IsInFightCave()) {
toX = 2439;
toY = 5169;
AtkPray = 0;
StrPrayer = 0;
DefPray = 0;
RangePray = 0;
MagePray = 0;
PrayHeal = false;
ProtItem = false;
ProtMage = false;
ProtRange = false;
ProtMelee = false;
Redemption = false;
Retribution = false;
Smite = false;
Chivalry = false;
Piety = false;
isSkulled = false;
lastSkull = 0;
headIcon = 0;
turnpray();
heightLevel = 0;
currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
deathStage = 0;
resetAnimation();
frame1();
prayOn = false;
sM(“You got owned!”);
resetOtherAtk();
}
if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {
toX = 2767+misc.random(1);
toY = 3277+misc.random(1);
AtkPray = 0;
StrPrayer = 0;
DefPray = 0;
RangePray = 0;
MagePray = 0;
PrayHeal = false;
ProtItem = false;
ProtMage = false;
ProtRange = false;
ProtMelee = false;
Redemption = false;
Retribution = false;
Smite = false;
Chivalry = false;
Piety = false;
isSkulled = false;
lastSkull = 0;
headIcon = 0;
turnpray();
heightLevel = 0;
currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
deathStage = 0;
resetAnimation();
frame1();
prayOn = false;
sM(“You got owned!”);
resetOtherAtk();
if (destruct)
{
absX = 2767+misc.random(1);
absY = 3277+misc.random(1);
}
savegame(false);
}
